title: Blindness
content:
ove. Blinded: Ranged attacks and spells have a range of 3 m and Attack Roll suffer Disadvantage. Attack Rolls against Blinded creatures have Advantage. Saving Throw: At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a CON Save. On a success, the spell ends.

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Arcane Lock ♦ Barkskin ♦ Blur ♦ Branding Smite ♦ Calm Emotions ♦ Chromatic Orb: Acid (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Cold (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Fire (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Lightning (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Poison (Lvl 2)
